name: Dungeon Loop
description:
Welcome to the magical forest dungeon of Loopyland!

You are a brave adventurer looking for tales to tell and make your way through this very special place.
At every step, you may encounter enemies that you will have to defeat... with music!

Be smart, synchronise your actions with your enemy's to defeat it and continue furthermore into the dungeon!

Controls:
- During battle, drag'n'drop your actions on your timeline
That's actually all!

Enjoy and have fun!
